verbose_text: As shown in XREF_FIG, using the proteasome inhibitor cocktail led to a 65% reduction in AhR induction by 100 nM PMA, along with an 86% decrease in IL-1beta enhancement, demonstrating that the proteasome inhibitor cocktail was able to prevent the IL-1beta induction triggered by the NFkappaB transduction pathway.
evidence: IL-1beta induction triggered by the NFkappaB
